snippet.title: Fear the Phantom | Trailer | Steam | PvP Horror
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam!
►►► https://bit.ly/ftpgame ◀◀◀ 

Fear the Phantom is an indie survival horror game with online multiplayer. Play with up to three friends as either a ghost hunter, or as an evil spirit. The objective as a ghost hunter is to use specialized equipment to examine and then exorcise the ghost. The ghost has only one thing in mind - killing the ghost hunters. 

The game will soon be released on Steam, so make sure to wishlist it to stay in the loop!

────────────────────────

► Steam: https://bit.ly/ftpgame
► Twitter: https://bit.ly/ftp-twitter
► Discord: https://bit.ly/3hVDgmy
► Instagram: https://bit.ly/3XdzMvM

#indiegame #horrorgaming #gamedev #trailer
